post.body: For the reord I am not fine, but better han I have been, does that make sense??
I love soccer too, but it's Friday night... I played semi-pro for A Texas Woman's team until I shredded my acl & shoulder
your drunken twitters are cracking me up... plus I love following people from other countries
Never to early for a little Baileys in the coffee. That or Kahlua.
bring snack and games, yesterday I was in line at the post office for over an hour.
@zoeyjane I don't know what is wrong with my profile pic, but thanks for the validation...I thought I was just drunk
I totally missed out on #gno tonight, thanks to my poop eating grandma and such...
@tjstaab she's fine, I don't know what is going on with her eating weird stuff. CLEANING IT UP SUCKED BIG TIME THOUGH..
because teens are CRAZY!
we are meeting in Carlsbad...
I second your opinion #thatblogessthatdoen'texistislikeafreakyghostbutweirder
SO inconsiderate, made me all weirded out that I was even at the same restaurant. Restaurant is good, but full of snobs, ruined it
A stuck-up patron
Snobby ladies walked in as I was walking out, I held the door for them and they *forgot* to say thank you so I yelled your welcome
Yea, we had 10 kids, 5 dogs and 9 adults for the holidays, I can't believe the house is still standing
It LOOKS like an earthquake, just way too many people staying with us :)
I've been cleaning the freaking kitchen with a toothbrush for TWO hours now. Please make this STOP!
Forcing down edamame ...don't wanna eat but know I need something.. I hate this; don't recall EVER asking for this ...
Soooo.... I'm starving, would like to say I am eating, but that would be a lie...So I am going to sleep instead...
I would say that Twitter DID save me from going "spiral" and you all *forced* me to eat, so...thanks
cuz I could be dancing naked in a parade or sometihg... trust me on that.
So, in-between scrubbing odd shit with my toothbrush, I am checking in here. THIS IS A FIRST FOR ME! and THANKS...
So, I'm fighting off this manic attack... one almond at a time. This is bizarre, I think that Twitter has actually helped... like for real
So I forced myself to eat, I had almonds... That is dinner right?
My psychiatrist said I always starve myself before I get manic... It's like a power trip in my own head, it's creepy..
I'm starving... I really need to remember to eat BEFORE I get this cranky, all I have had today is coffee and water. I'm falling apart.
Getting ready to go watch my 12y/o daughter play soccer against the boys team. Sadly, this is my life...soccer on a Friday night. *sigh*
The plumbers are back, and under the house AGAIN! I guess the violent threats worked...
Wondering if I should just strip naked and walk door to door and let the police lock me up...might make things easier.
My family is all up in my business... http://tinyurl.com/6lk94f
My bird drank my coffee, sure hope he handles caffeine well, cuz I added a shot or two of espresso
I'm giving up...
Isn't that what @$%@%$ing Draino is for stupid motherbumber plumbers
Trying to convince that grandma that she REALLY REALLY needs a shower...
Driving my kids to school in the rain was interesting with no working blinkers or winshield wipers...
SOOO... Twitter hates me, or my profile picture -- I can't fix it. So is my little empty box with weird lingo in it hot enough?
My teenager came through (FOR ONCE) and went to get some anti-diarrhea medicine for my grandma...cuz I'm NOT cleaning that all night. Ick
Forget it! I think I just confused everything even worse...
I meant Is not "I profile " Cuz "I profile sounds pretty "hoody"
I my profile pic messed up to everyone or just me??
I need a flipping break from my life...
And then a pool of wine...
OMG! Just spent an hour cleaning up my grandma's mess. She ate her own poop, um... I need to dump myself in a bucket of bleach..
Heading out to a soccer holiday party, in other words playing nice with the parents that I don't really like so much. #gno fun little later
Grandma is fine...phew!
On the phone with Hospice, my grandma fainted, or had a mini-stroke or something. Got her on the bed and then she demanded hot cocoa...
Going to work at the middle school, those kids are bananas. I think banana is a REALLY fun word to type
Going to a casino to test my luck with @bedsidetalesman
And @bedsidetales man joined us!
Had so much fun w/ @tjstaab and her kids
On my way to meet @tjstaab for lunch
Godnight all, this Mt Veener winery wine is getting to my head...
My sister just called and said "We'll be there in about an hour to spend the night" WHAT??? I thought I was done with guests...
Looking forward to meeting@tjstaab tomorrow....
Receipt is off by only $7.46 and it's driving me nuts, maybe I need to drink more, or maybe less
Trying to make sense out of my Trader Joes receipt, I swear it's wrong I've triple added it up (it's the accountant in me) it's still WRONG!
Having a glass of 2005 Mt Veeder Cabernet and it is BEYOND GOOD!
Then they started talking trash, they're lucky I didn't punch them
Just got into a fight at Ruth's Chris Steakhouse in Beverly Hills. Frickin' snooty ass people there, so annoying.
I made love to a Suburban, and it was GOOD! http://manicmariah.blogspot.com
